name: Cinematic
prompt: cinematic lighting, depth of field, professional photography, movie still, dramatic atmosphere, color grading, high budget, 8k uhd, high production value
negative_prompt: blurry, overexposed, underexposed, amateur, low quality, grainy, noisy, distorted, pixelated

name: Fantasy
prompt: magical atmosphere, ethereal lighting, mystical creatures, enchanted forest, glowing particles, floating elements, magical effects, fantasy landscape, otherworldly
negative_prompt: modern elements, urban setting, mundane objects, realistic style, contemporary, mundane

name: Fantastic
prompt: surreal atmosphere, dreamlike quality, floating islands, impossible architecture, cosmic elements, prismatic colors, fantasy creatures, otherworldly scene
negative_prompt: realistic, mundane, ordinary, simple composition, basic lighting

name: Action
prompt: dynamic pose, motion blur, intense lighting, action scene, explosive effects, dramatic angle, high energy, power pose, epic moment
negative_prompt: static pose, boring composition, flat lighting, peaceful scene, calm atmosphere

name: Portrait
prompt: professional studio lighting, bokeh background, sharp focus, perfect composition, detailed facial features, professional retouching, fashion photography
negative_prompt: blurry, bad lighting, noisy background, overexposed, amateur look, unfocused

name: Anime
prompt: anime art style, cel shading, vibrant colors, dramatic lighting, expressive eyes, detailed hair, clean lines, manga influence
negative_prompt: photorealistic, western art style, 3d rendering, realistic textures, noisy

name: Vintage
prompt: retro style, film grain, muted colors, nostalgic atmosphere, old photo effect, analog film, classic composition, aged texture
negative_prompt: modern look, sharp digital, clean edges, vivid colors, contemporary style

name: Minimalistic
prompt: clean lines, simple composition, minimal details, negative space, geometric shapes, elegant design, clear focus
negative_prompt: cluttered, complex, busy composition, heavy textures, ornate details

name: Noir
prompt: black and white, high contrast, dramatic shadows, film noir style, moody lighting, venetian blinds shadows, mysterious atmosphere
negative_prompt: colorful, soft lighting, flat contrast, cheerful mood, bright scene
